<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>
  <h1> .large[Trend: Avg Foreign Aid per capita (.red[GDPpc<10k])] </h1>
</div><br><br>



```{r include=F, cache=T}

library(tidyverse)
library(WDI)
library(ggplot2)

var = c('ODApc' = "DT.ODA.ODAT.PC.ZS",
        'ODApg' = "DC.ODA.TOTL.GN.ZS",
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'tariff' = 'TM.TAX.MRCH.SM.AR.ZS')

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1960,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

wdi %>% 
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 10000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 10000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) -> wdi2
```                     
                     
```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=7, cache=T}

# Aid dependence (aid per capita)


wdi2 %>%
  filter(developed == "underdeveloped") %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, ODApc)) +
    geom_smooth(alpha=0.5, size=2) + labs(x="Year",
       y="Aid per capita") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=25),
        axis.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.title=element_text(size=25)) +
  theme_minimal()


```

<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>

</div><br><br><br><br><br><br>


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}

# Aid Dependence (& of GNI)

wdi2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, ODApg)) +
    geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=1) + labs(x="Year",
       y="Aid, % of GNI") +
  geom_point(alpha=0.15, size=3) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=25),
        axis.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.title=element_text(size=25)) +
  theme_minimal()

```

---
<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>
  <h1> .large[The correlation between Aid/GNI and development] </h1>
</div><br><br><br>


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=7, cache=T}


# Development effect of aid dependence

wdi2 %>%
  filter(developed == "underdeveloped") %>%
  filter(ODApc > 50) %>%
  filter(ODApc < 1000) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=ODApc, y=GDPpc)) +
    geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=1) +
    geom_point(alpha=0.15, size=3) +
    labs(x="Aid per capita",
       y="GDP per capita") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15)) +
  theme_minimal()

```
